name: Turkey Disguise
description:
Share your codes in the comments, and the "C" and "L" in the code are ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY for the whole save code thing to work.
So be sure to type it correctly. It is also case sensitive. My current favorite disguise is: C0505L030302
I may be adding more when I can, so check back often!
*TIP!* Use Ctrl+V to paste a code into the answer box in the game!
